message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2,000,000. This is a great deal, considering its worth to you is $1,500,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm very interested in this product, but I can only go up to $1,700,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $1,800,000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. Let me know if this is acceptable to you.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. I'm willing to offer $1,750,000. This is my final offer, let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as high as $1,750,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counteroffer at $1,780,000. This is the absolute maximum I'm willing to go. If you're not comfortable with this, I'm open to discussing other options, but I'm not going to go any higher.
